    <script>
        function loadPtitle(pagetitle) {

            $("#PTitle").text(pagetitle);
        }
        $(document).ready(function () {

            loadGallery(true, 'a.thumbnail');

            function disableButtons(counter_max, counter_current) {
                $('#show-previous-image, #show-next-image').show();
                if (counter_max == counter_current) {
                    $('#show-next-image').hide();
                } else if (counter_current == 1) {
                    $('#show-previous-image').hide();
                }
            }

            function loadGallery(setIDs, setClickAttr) {
                var current_image,
                    selector,
                    counter = 0;

                $('#show-next-image, #show-previous-image').click(function () {
                    if ($(this).attr('id') == 'show-previous-image') {
                        current_image--;
                    } else {
                        current_image++;
                    }

                    selector = $('[data-image-id="' + current_image + '"]');
                    updateGallery(selector);
                });

                function updateGallery(selector) {
                    var $sel = selector;
                    current_image = $sel.data('image-id');
                    $('#image-gallery-heading').text($sel.data('heading'));
                    $('#image-gallery-caption').text($sel.data('caption'));
                    $('#image-gallery-title').text($sel.data('title'));
                    $('#image-gallery-image').attr('src', $sel.data('image'));
                    disableButtons(counter, $sel.data('image-id'));
                }

                if (setIDs == true) {
                    $('[data-image-id]').each(function () {
                        counter++;
                        $(this).attr('data-image-id', counter);
                    });
                }
                $(setClickAttr).on('click', function () {
                    updateGallery($(this));
                });
            }
        });
        function ActiveAboutMenu() {
            $("#about").addClass("active");
        }
        function ActiveReportMenu() {
            $("#report").addClass("active");
        }

        
        
        function LoadReportDownload2017GA() {
            ga('send', {
                hitType: 'event',
                eventCategory: 'Click',
                eventAction: 'Download',
                eventLabel: 'GII 2017 Report'
            });
        }

        function LoadPortugueseReportDownload2017GA() {
            ga('send', {
                hitType: 'event',
                eventCategory: 'Click',
                eventAction: 'Download',
                eventLabel: 'GII 2017 Portuguese Report'
            });
        }

            });

            });

<div class="container">
	<div class="home-main vspace">
		<div class="col-sm-4 col-xs-6 col-xxs-12 padl0">
			<img alt="" class="img-responsive" src="images/news-img-2017.jpg" /></div>
		<div class="col-sm-8 col-xs-12">
			<h1>
				Global Innovation Index 2017 Report Now Available</h1>
			<!--<p style="font-size: 0.8em;">
				The Global Innovation Index (GII) 2017 will be released at the United Nations Headquarters in Geneva, Switzerland, on June 15, 2017. Follow via livestream on the homepage from 10:00 a.m. Geneva time.</p>-->
			<p style="font-size: 0.8em; padding-top: 15px;">
				<b>The Global Innovation Index</b> provides detailed metrics about the innovation performance of 127 countries and economies around the world. Its 81 indicators explore a broad vision of innovation, including political environment, education, infrastructure and business sophistication.</p>
			<div class="col-xs-12 nopadding" style="margin-top: 15px; margin-bottom: 15px;">
				<a href="Javascript:void(0)" id="download_file" onclick="LoadReportDownload2017GA()" style="cursor: pointer;float:left;"><input class="btn-orange" type="button" value="Download the 2017 report" /></a> <a href="/gii-2017-report" style="float:left;"><input class="btn-white orange" type="button" value="Read the 2017 report" /> </a> <a href="/analysis-indicator" style="float:left;"> <input class="btn-white orange" type="button" value="View 2017 analysis" /></a></div>
			<p style="font-size: 0.8em;">
				Now in its 10th edition, the GII 2017 focuses on <b>innovation in agriculture and food systems</b>. In the coming decades, the agriculture and food sector will face an enormous rise in global demand, increased competition for limited natural resources, and the effects of climate change. Innovation is key to sustaining the productivity growth required to meet this rising demand and to helping enhance the networks (&quot;food systems&quot;) that integrate sustainable food production, processing, distribution, consumption, and waste management.</p>
			<p style="font-size: 0.8em;">
				Explore this year&rsquo;s rankings and findings here: <a href="/gii-2017-report">GII 2017 REPORT</a></p>
			<div class="col-xs-12 nopadding" style="margin-top: 10px;">
				<span style="font-size: 0.8em;color: #333333;font-weight: 300;"><!--Explore the past reports here:--></span> <strong><strong><a href="/about-gii#reports" style="margin-left:2px !important;"><input class="btn-white orange" type="button" value="View past reports" /></a> <a href="Javascript:void(0)" id="download_Portuguesefile" onclick="LoadPortugueseReportDownload2017GA()" style="cursor: pointer;"><input class="btn-white orange" style="width:275px;" type="button" value="Download 2017 Portuguese report" /></a></strong></strong></div>
			<div class="col-xs-12 nopadding">
				<div class="col-xs-6 col-xxs-12 padl0 co-partners">
					<p>
						<strong><strong>Co-Publishers</strong></strong></p>
					<ul class="list-inline publishers">
						<li>
							<strong><strong><a href="https://business.cornell.edu/" target="_blank"><img alt="Johnson" class="img-responsive" src="images/johnson-logo.png" /></a></strong></strong></li>

				</div>

    <div class="modal-dialog">
        <div class="modal-content">
            <div class="modal-header nopadding">

                <h3 class="modal-title" id="videoandpdf-gallery-heading"></h3>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function () {
        loadGallery(true, 'a.popUpData');

        function disableButtons(counter_max, counter_current) {
            $('#show-previous-image, #show-next-image').show();
            if (counter_max == counter_current) {
                $('#show-next-image').hide();
            } else if (counter_current == 1) {
                $('#show-previous-image').hide();
            }
        }

        function loadGallery(setIDs, setClickAttr) {
            var current_image,
                selector,
                counter = 0;

            $('#show-next-image, #show-previous-image').click(function () {
                if ($(this).attr('id') == 'show-previous-image') {
                    current_image--;
                } else {
                    current_image++;
                }

                selector = $('[data-image-id="' + current_image + '"]');
                updateGallery(selector);
            });

            function updateGallery(selector) {
                var $sel = selector;
                current_image = $sel.data('image-id');
                $('#image-gallery-caption').text($sel.data('caption'));
                $('#videoandpdf-gallery-caption').text($sel.data('caption'));
                $('#image-gallery-title').text($sel.data('title'));
                $('#videoandpdf-gallery-title').text($sel.data('title'));
                $('#videoandpdf-gallery-heading').text($sel.data('heading'));
                $('#image-gallery-heading').text($sel.data('heading'));
                $('#image-gallery-image').attr('src', $sel.data('image'));
                $('#videoandpdf-gallery-videoandpdf').attr('src', $sel.data('videoandpdf'));
                disableButtons(counter, $sel.data('image-id'));
            }

            if (setIDs == true) {
                $('[data-image-id]').each(function () {
                    counter++;
                    $(this).attr('data-image-id', counter);
                });
            }
            $(setClickAttr).on('click', function () {
                updateGallery($(this));
            });
        }
    });
</script>
